website_summaries.verdict: Cleans many different kinds of stone surfaces. Doesn't contain toxic ingredients.
pros: Dissolves most greases and oils successfully and quickly using only safe materials
Eliminates streaks while cleaning and polishing the countertop to create a beautiful finish
Safe for use on surfaces like granite, marble, quartz, and onyx
cons: A little expensive per ounce, but it does ship with a microfiber towel

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic! It cleans like no other granite cleaner I have tried, there are no smudges or smears just a mirror like shine and the smell is fresh and clean. I first tried Therapy Stainless Steel cleaner and was so impressed with the results from that product that I could hardly wait to try the granite cleaner, I knew I would not be disappointed. Also, I have cultured marble counter tops in my bathroom and this granite cleaner performs amazing on those as well. I would highly recommend these products to anyone looking for a product that thoroughly cleans granite and stainless better than anything else on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Works great, worth the extra $
customer_reviews.text: We'd been using basic 409 or windex on our countertops but got a little worried that maybe the chemicals were damaging the granite long term. We were doing the same with our metal fridge, and came across the other Therapy product (stainless steel cleaner). It worked great, nice shine, removed streaks etc...and the granite cleaner is more of that same quality. A tad pricier than some of the other more mainstream brands, but worth it in my book...plus it comes with a microfiber towel, so there's your extra few bucks (plus nontoxic chemicals) I also feel a little better having the kids around the kitchen with non toxic cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Jephkelley

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I was a bit skeptical but after reading positive reviews I decided to give it a try as my granite countertops were beginning to look their age and were no longer shining and looking the way they should. It took more than one application as there were areas that needed extra help but this product was amazing and I was very pleased with the results. I did have a question about laundering the black cloth and they responded quickly reassuring me it was ok as long as u line dry . Very satisfied and I am going to be using this from now on and ordering more .
customer_reviews.author: Cosmosmom

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product. Products I have used in the past ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. Products I have used in the past seem to leave a dull film. This cleaner and polisher does not. I am very pleased with the results and will be a repeat customer!
customer_reviews.author: Randi Esau

customer_reviews.title: So far the best cleaner I have found
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to get my verde butterfly granite to shine like glass. When I first used this I didn't think it did much. Subsequent applications seem to make it nicer. It hasn't gotten to the shine I am hoping for yet but it also doesn't dull like all the others I have used. I also noticed that stuff will leave a ring on the surface now but it buffs out with the cloth that is supplied. The seller contacts you right away and does offer a refund if you are not satisfied. I am satisfied but also wonder if this is better that using Pledge, which I found is what a restaurant was using.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Mom

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe i am praising a cleaning product but it's that good
customer_reviews.text: I no longer curse my counters and the former owner who installed miles of black granite in my kitchen. Supermarket granite cleaner left a greasy, streaky mess behind. They never looked clean even if i used One rag to clean and another to dry and buff. This product came with a microfiber cloth which cleans in one go. The counters never looked this good (though i still would prefer tile that can be cleaned with vinegar)
customer_reviews.author: kmbs

customer_reviews.title: CLOTH WILL STAIN YOUR GRANITE.
customer_reviews.text: The spray is nice... However. I was using it and the included cloth to buff a scuff from my new granite counter tops and the cloth STAINED the counter. A black stain on my WHITE granite counters. This is incredibly upsetting. Don't include a cloth that is dyed and will stain the very surface it's meant to clean. Would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and polishes granite incredibly well
customer_reviews.text: We recently installed a new black granite countertop in our kitchen and have been desperately searching for a product that won’t leave streaks! I tried a few of the store brand products, but with no luck. After doing some research we came across Therapy and decided to give it a try. So far the product has done an excellent job cleaning and polishing the surface without any residue. They also included a nice microfiber cloth which really helps lift up any of the dirt and oil on the surface. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a streak-free granite cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner goes on easy and wipes off easy - no buffing needed for ...
customer_reviews.text: Cleaner goes on easy and wipes off easy - no buffing needed for a beautiful shine on my granite counter-tops. The (free) cloth is lush and an excellent accompaniment to the cleaner/polish. Very happy with this product and my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julieede

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market. 😍
customer_reviews.text: I have black granite with flecks of cobalt blue. It shows every smudge mark and streak imaginable. I have tried so many cleaners and they all would leave a residue which made it worse. This is the first cleaner I’ve used on our granite that leaves it shiny with NO residue. There’s zero streaks. I’ve even used it on our stainless without issues as well as on our bathroom mirror with the microfiber cloth and it left no steaks on the mirror. I will order more to always have on hand! Smell Is fresh lemon and very very light.
customer_reviews.author: LMT

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I love this cleaner! I have a very dark granite that drives me crazy because everything I have used to clean it leaves streaks or a filmy residue. This cleaner is easy to use and leaves a beautiful shine on my countertops. Will definitely be buying again. I also purchased the stainless steel cleaner and I love that as well! Easier to use than others I have tried and I am able to wipe off any fingerprints or marks without having to polish the entire appliance which definitely makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Michele J.

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Therapy product I have tried and am very impressed! The therapy daily granite cleaner took off all sorts of burned on food and grease without too much buffing. What I liked is that the kit comes with a scrubbing sponge which cleaned our ceramic range and didn’t scratch. A little bit of product went a long way so I think this is actually a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Cristhian Fernando Rojas Ceron

customer_reviews.title: MADE MY COUNTERS SHINE!!
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a brand new house(newly built) about a year ago. Throughout the year our granite counters lost their shine and vibrancy. We bought this hoping that it would help revive them. I didn’t have high hopes but I was SO wrong! I sprayed it directly on the counter and rubbed it in. It soaked in over night / settled. The next day, WOW they really looked how that did the day we moved in. It is not I’m my bucket of MUST HAVE cleaning supplies. Highly recommend and for the money it’s a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Hays

customer_reviews.title: Extra shine
customer_reviews.text: I have always said that they no use for fancy cleaners, but after 9 years of soap and water the granite was loosing its shine so I gave in and OH BOY !!! Worth every penny my counter as a incredible shine and very easy to use, this fancy cleaner/polish does make a huge difference, yes water and a good scrub will do it but maybe you want just a extra shine and this will do it .
customer_reviews.author: Irene Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Revised : Don't waste your money.  Product performs poorly
customer_reviews.text: After using it a few times I realized that the product is designed to get you to use as much of it as possible. So to get your cloth to glide across the surface you will need to use a lot of it. And it seems to provide zero protection from finger prints. With clean hands every finger print shows back up. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: agoshopper

customer_reviews.title: This was easier to apply, them some of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was easier to apply, them some of the other granite products, that I have used, and came with a bonus microfiber cloth, with which to apply it. I do have a couple of spots, where hard water has built up, on my counter, and affected the shine, and I do think this did make a slight difference in those areas. Maybe, over time, with continual use, I will see more of an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: tallgal

customer_reviews.title: Best Granite Cleaner Ever!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I purchased for my granite it would smear. According to reviews this stuff was supposed to be good. Well when it arrived I tried it. It is wonderful. No more smeared granite. It looks like glass. I cannot say enough about this. I have tried many many products and this one does what it says. I LOVE IT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C G

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells awesome and it cleans reasonably well
customer_reviews.text: I usually hit the granite countertop with 409 cleaner first to get the major stuff and then go over with this cleaner for the final polish to remove any remnants and/or streaks and my granite shines like new! It smells quite nice also. I actually enjoy cleaning with it now.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: It does an excellent job at cleaning our black granite countertops
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this! Packaging was a lot larger than expected (+ microfiber towel is awesome), which is a plus. It does an excellent job at cleaning our black granite countertops, leaving no streaks and leaves a nice polish/seal. It has a very pleasant scent. We have tried the Therapy Stainless Steel cleaner which is the best out there, so we thought to give this a try as well. This product did not disappoint! Shipping was also very fast...Excellent job!
customer_reviews.author: A. Race

customer_reviews.title: Still leaves film.
customer_reviews.text: Eh. Still leaves film. Even after a good soap and water cleaning first. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another so-so
customer_reviews.text: Hmmmm, it's okay. There are a number of cleaners which do as good a job as this product. The problem is not with the cleaner, but my granite: black with burgundy. The black shows every water spot. Even with a buffer, I couldn't get the granite to keep it's shine. hmmmmm.
customer_reviews.author: CR Mainwearing

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a Beautiful Shine
customer_reviews.text: I needed a granite cleaner and polish that was non-toxic and effective, and Therapy Granite Cleaner + Polish has been the perfect solution for keeping the granite in my home beautiful and clean. I use it at least once a month for a deep clean of my counters, and it leaves a beautiful shine that lasts. The kit includes a thick microfiber cleaning cloth so that you don’t have to purchase one separately. I am impressed with the results of this product.
customer_reviews.author: amlamb

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype!!!
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot for a great cleaner for my granite counter top. By far this is the single best cleaner I have used! Believe the great reviews. I didn’t 100% until I used it. Only cleaner I will use from now on for granite!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce F

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of granite and this did clean and somewhat polish, but I don’t see a huge difference and it smells fine, but not unlike other products that are scented, I don’t think I’d spend this much for it again unless it changes over use. The microfiber towel it comes with is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Nichol Cassoni

customer_reviews.title: Do not believe the claims of "safe and non-toxic. ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not believe the claims of "safe and non-toxic." This cleaner contains methylisothizolinone, which can cause contact dermatitis and is a cytotoxin. It is dangerous to humans and the environment. Check the label and google it. I'm very sorry I bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything that I expected it to be based on other reviews that I read prior to purchase. I am thoroughly impressed and pleased with the sheen/shine that it puts off after applying the product to my granite. So far I can say this product is performing in every way that I expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: TopModel

customer_reviews.title: Great granite cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this product here and decide to give it a try since other products contain a lot of chemicals that I don't want in my kitchen surfaces where I handle food. The product is great, it leaves granite clean and shiny without much effort, the included sponge is perfect and it smells good. As the kitchen is sometimes greasy is good to have a product that can handle it and not be abrasive with the granite. Product recommended
customer_reviews.author: AmznClient

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, works very well cloth that comes with it is good quality check. Used many others this seems to give the most shine to the granite. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: lives up to advertising
customer_reviews.text: James, I have used many different products to clean granite. I am so happy I came across your product and purchased it. I love it! It does not streak and leaves the counters feeling clean without any gritty feel. I will be a long-term customer from this point forward and would be happy to recommend it to anyone I know who wants the same fresh clean feel that I do! Great job and thank you for caring about my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: CTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would help revitalize and bring a shine back to my marble countertops. Like other marbles cleaners I’ve used, I’m still getting a dull finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves granite shining and doesn’t leave a film.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the Granite cleaner and polish kit. It is the only one that I have used that doesn’t leave a film when I wipe off counter with damp cloth in between applications.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia A.

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, not a great polish
customer_reviews.text: Great scent but I dont feel like it is really polishing anything. Also seems a little pricey as a daily cleaner if you have a large surface space.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It's not worth it. Don't waste your money. I can achieve the same result with plain water.
customer_reviews.author: Lilliam Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: MEH!
customer_reviews.text: After having a brilliant experience with their stainless steel cleaner I decided to give this a try. I'm afraid it's just okay, but it's good as at least it doesn't have some overpowering fragrance. My homemade stuff maybe better.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice glossy shine in granite and quartz counters
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well, leaves nice glossy shine. Worked slightly better than the Stone Care International Polish and the cleaner. Worked great on my granite and quartz counter tops. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bori76

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the stainless steel cleaner first and absolutely loved it. I then went back for this cleaner. It cleaned my granite cabinet tops, removing a build up of film that had accumulated. I will keep this on hand for all my future cleaning needs.
customer_reviews.author: M Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I've tried other granite cleaners, they all seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other granite cleaners, they all seem to be the same. They really don't make the granite shine, but I'm thinking it's just the way the granite is, some shine and some do not. So it's really not fair to rate.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Skidmore

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, works well
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and works really well especially with the cleaning cloth that comes with it. It gets grime that I didn’t even realize was on our busy countertop pattern. Makes the kitchen shiny and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Meg R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do a thing for my counter tops
customer_reviews.text: Can’t tell that product makes any difference. I can save my money and Just spraying water on my counters and gets the same effect.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: No streaks or smears!
customer_reviews.text: After trying every granite cleaner ever made, I splurged on this product during a COVID-198 social distancing shopping spree on Amazon. My granite is black with marbled gray and a little sparkle. The cleaner left my granite sparkling! A little pricey, but I will definitely re-order!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I was using Method Granite Cleaner, I ordered this it put's an amazing shine on my Granite. Could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Stronger product
customer_reviews.text: Make a stronger product as some food stains cannot come out like celery or fruit stains.
customer_reviews.author: Shenaz Esmail

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: This granite cleaner is easy to use and cleans my quartz countertops wonderfully. I spray a little on and with the microfiber cloth that is included, my countertops shine with little effort. The steps are easy, just spray and wipe. I am definitely a fan of the Therapy products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Streak free dark granite
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I’ve used thus far, ordering again. Honestly, on dark granite it’s hard to stop streaks. The cloth allows better pick-up, cleaning, and streak-less shine.
customer_reviews.author: Chad D

customer_reviews.title: Get method for cheaper does the same job
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much like method cleaner which is a lot cheaper. Overall good product but overpriced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Christy V

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived completely damaged. Looking for return of money, but I see no reason to return an exploded & empty bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Rataj

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily to keep my granite looking new! It does a great job cleaning and polishing, it also smells nice! (Lemony)
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Makes my granite countertops sparkle! Very pleased with this product. Excellent customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: it cleaned up smudges immediately and easily.
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned my fridge with this once and it has stayed clean for a whole month. Plus, it cleaned up smudges immediately and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Hudson

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: A great product . It ckeans and polishes my granite very well and You can see the difference immediately .The lemony sent is not too strong which is great. The over all look of the product is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Nahi

customer_reviews.title: Made my granite countertops really shine
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Made my dull dirty granite countertops really shine. Good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Cleans marble counters well but hard to apply
customer_reviews.text: I used the product to clean marble counter tops in the bathroom. It has a pleasing scent. I do not know if the spray bottle was defective, but it almost created a puddle and I had to pour it into another spray bottle.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, smell is clean, goes on easy, and wipes away clear with no visible streaks and a cleans and shining appearance.
customer_reviews.author: ben Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product that I use on granite counter tops in kitchen. I have used many products on granite/quartz and marble and Therapy has worked best for me. No streaking or residue. Value priced!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best consumer granite cleaner and polish I've tried. Nice scent as well.
customer_reviews.author: papabois

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner!!! Really makes the granite shine!!! Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: KellBell

customer_reviews.title: Love this granite cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this granite cleaner!! It cleans really well and even comes with it's own microfiber cleaning towel. I think the price is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Featherston

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this polish! Really shines but doesn’t leave any residue..
customer_reviews.author: Pixie’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect granite cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. I remodeled my kitchen and looking for a an appropriate granite cleaner and found this product to be the best. It cleans and shines without the chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M

customer_reviews.title: Leaves no spots
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Radon removal

customer_reviews.title: Clean and shiney!!
customer_reviews.text: Therapy Dailey Granite Cleaner is such a great product! Leaves a beautiful, clean shine on my granite with no residue and no odor...and at a very reasonable price...I'm happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many granite cleaners, this one does an excellent job. Use just a bit and polish with dry cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful, and leaves my bathroom counters shiny and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Candice D

customer_reviews.title: Works great, doesn’d and the microfiber cloth it comes with is thick and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many, many, many products for my granite, this one has shown the best results. They also make an excellent stainless steel cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: RMK

customer_reviews.title: No chemicals!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. It did not only clean my granite! It was fantastic on my back mirrored bathroom cabinets and stainless steel!
customer_reviews.author: Ari Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I found that works on my black granite top. I highly recommend it, very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was excellent! I didn't realize how dull it looked, but this product brought out it's original form!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The best granite cleaner I've found and use have gone through many works great on marble also.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN F READLE

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and shines
customer_reviews.text: This product really does work. This will be my granite cleaner for now on.
customer_reviews.author: Hook em

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Product works better than anything else I have used to clean our quartz counter-tops!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!!!! I have tried a lot of products and this leaves no streaks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pickert

customer_reviews.title: Keep your granite countertops amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product especially if you want your countertops to shine and look beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Pacholec

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: My granite looks brand new every time I spray on this polish. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Renata L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff, but granite cleaner I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Pusateri

customer_reviews.title: All good!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The company contacted me immediately and sent me the correct product. It is AWESOME! I love it, my granite looks and feels amazing! Since I got to keep the stainless steel cleaner I can't wait to use that now! Thank u!! Totally bought this in March. Used it a couple times. Then I noticed the other day they sent me stainless steel polish not granite! WASTE OF MONEY. Can't return now it's too late. I'm pissed!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff and does not streak as long as you polish with the grain. Cleans and polishes in one application.
customer_reviews.author: fparker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome granite cleaner and polish!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Leaves my granite clean AND shiny, when my last cleaner left it cloudy. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ammie Harris

customer_reviews.title: A must have granite cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second product I’ve purchased from Therapy and once again I’m delighted with how well this granite cleaner and polisher works. This cleaner leaves no residue, film or grit behind...only a beautiful shine. I have the stainless steel polish also and can’t tell you how well that works! Looking forward to buying the cooktop cleaner when it’s back in stock. Best products in their fields hands down!!
customer_reviews.author: FromCT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in Every Expectation, High Shine on My Granite Countertops Again.
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY I have found the absolute best granite counter top cleaner, polish. It is amazing, not toxic, not streaky or oily, just perfect. I have a totally renewed look of a high buff shine on my dark granite kitchen counter tops, and I am thrilled. I have bought just about every other cleaner polish there is out there, but this one totally delivers. And like the product is named, Therapy, it's almost cheap thrills to have my counter tops perfectly shining again!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaner. I thought it would be best to get a natural cleaner since my dog likes to lick everything and has a very sensitive stomach. It works great and smells great too. I bought both of their other products too and looking forward to a wood cleaner soon!
customer_reviews.author: cdilgenfritz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even removed some hard water stains
customer_reviews.text: I live with the hassle of hard water, and it loves to stain granite. This worked really well, and over time I have gotten rid of almost all the build up, with a good amount of elbow grease too. The scent is not bad, and I can handle it, even though I am allergic to most fragrances. I will buy it again when the bottle runs out.
customer_reviews.author: spg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this product I was impressed at how shiny my granite and onyx looked. I was using a product that I had to put on, wait, and then use another cloth to take off. The shine wasn't half as nice. I would highly recommend this product for granite and onyx.
customer_reviews.author: Therese636

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, cleans up coffee spills and whatnot very well
customer_reviews.text: I am amazingly surprised at how well it works. I could see reflections in the granite tops I used it on. The not-as-polished granite didn’t reflect but it still shined and the colors were very vivid. Smells good, cleans up coffee spills and whatnot very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ayris

customer_reviews.title: Good Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice and not overpowering and works great. Give a shine to the granite. The bottle looks nice enough to leave on the dark spotted granite counter with it's dark brown plastic. High quality towel that really works well with the spray is included.
customer_reviews.author: Fav

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, worth the splurge for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about a year and am back for more. Love the smell and how it leaves my granite countertops looking. It's worth the extra money for me. I only wish they still sold the two pack or a gallon sized refill container so I could be environmentally friendly and reuse the squirt bottle.
customer_reviews.author: jennyforfun

customer_reviews.title: Plant-based products that work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the Therapy granite cleaner/polish and stainless steel cleaner/polish. My stainless appliances look awesome - like new again and the granite has a lovely luster I hadn’t seen before. Love that they are plant-based.
customer_reviews.author: DWD+Chi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly Dull
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing product. I bought based on all the glowing reviews and wanting to combine cleaning and polishing in one step. What I'm left with is a slightly dull finish that needs to be cleaned again with damp rag to restore full shine, no matter how much buffing is done. I've since returned to using Hope's Perfect Granite at 1/3 the price; it cleans very well and provides superior shine. Nice microfiber cloth, though.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne480

customer_reviews.title: Great granite cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I really like this granite cleaner...and I’ve tried many. It sprays nicely, has a pleasant scent and it wipes up nicely and quickly with the microfiber cloth provided. It doesn’t leave streaks either. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Jan B. Rutte

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I have 10 year old granite counters that ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have 10 year old granite counters that have been sitting in a vacant house for 9 years. I tried another brand that, eh, sort of did a good job. This brand. Wow. Spray on, microfiber buff, done. No waiting an hour, no tacky residue, no speckles, no multiple steps. I am loving this stuff so much I just ordered more. Makes my granite a pleasure to clean and a pleasure to touch. LOVE this!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner with No Harsh Smell
customer_reviews.text: My previous granite cleaner had such a strong smell that I had to have the windows open to use it, making it a no-go during the long Michigan winters. This has a light to no smell and cleans great! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tams

customer_reviews.title: Seems Good
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about what products to use on my granite counters and wanted something non-caustic and natural. This seems to really work and leaves a streak-free shine. Smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: Customer123

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! I can't say enough about this product!!! I have spent so much money on granite cleaners and was not happy with the results. After trying Therapy Stainless Steel Cleaner and thought I would try the Granite Cleaner -- OM Goodness -- my black quartz counters have never looked so good -- the shine is amazing!!! No residue -- just a nice clean soft surface. Thank you Therapy!! How about a wood/furniture cleaner now??? :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne

customer_reviews.title: Has really helped clean and polish my Quartzite. My ...
customer_reviews.text: Has really helped clean and polish my Quartzite. My honed quartzite shows water spots and this will clean it and help maintain the seal.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: I love that it cleans and polishes in one - call me lazy but I enjoy that it works this well so quickly. I find it cleans pretty easy too - cuts through very well. A definite winner!
customer_reviews.author: Slakkie

customer_reviews.title: this is so much better than anything I have used...it shines
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed many products and chose this because of lack of harmful chemicals. It definitely meets the high recommendations I saw... it cleans and leaves a great shine.
customer_reviews.author: maryann2h

customer_reviews.title: great [product
customer_reviews.text: Have a lot of granite countertops and struggle to keep it looking clean. This product is easy to use and actually works! Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: sheri

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This product works great in the form of appearance. Applications goes on and wipes off very easy and if it really seals/protects the granite as good as it looks, this product is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: kent

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't remove hard water stains on granite.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to remove hard water stains. Failed at that but does make granite counter shiny. Nice fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth finish
customer_reviews.text: We tried different types of cleaners that were safe for granite, however they all left a sticky film on the stone. This product leaves the tops feeling like they were just waxed and shiny without any heavy residue. Nice addition with the microfiber. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I just used for the black granite countertop. I can tell the difference. It works! But i ordered with stainless one and the stainless one came in a nice box but this one came in a plate bag and towel tag got cut already.
customer_reviews.author: BTC

product_meta.title: Therapy - Granite Cleaner and Polish Kit with Large Microfiber Cloth, 16 fl. oz.
feature_bullets: Powerfully dissolves grease, oil, dirt, and grime on your high end surfaces in seconds
Cleans granite, marble, quartz, slate, limestone, travertine, terrazzo, and more
Leaves a brilliant glossy and protected finish without streaks or haze.
Comes with a premium microfiber towel to use with your Therapy granite cleaner
Safe and non-toxic ingredients used in Therapy products
